text:
The fog clings to you like a shroud, thick and biting. It whispers as you move, not in language, but in feeling—regret, longing, despair. Shapes flicker at the edges of your vision: a child's silhouette, a knight with no head, a wolf weeping fire.

The path vanishes beneath your feet more than once. Time warps here. You step forward, but your shadow stays behind. When the mist finally parts, you find yourself in a glade twisted by thorns and silence. A tree stands at its heart, split down the middle and bleeding black sap.
lore: This fog was once the veil between life and the grey beyond. It now serves as a test. Those who emerge are changed. Those who vanish… become the fog.
